summary: Based on the life of a legendary capoeira fighter from Bahia, "Besouro" spins a fantastic tale of a young Brazilian man of African descent in search of his mission.
cast: Aílton Carmo|Jéssica Barbosa|Flávio Rocha|Irandhir Santos|Mestre Alipio|Ânderson Santos de Jesus|Leno Sacramento|Cris Vianna|Sérgio Laurentino|Geísa Costa|Nilton Júnior|Servílio de Holanda|Antônio Fábio|Adriana Alves|Miguel Lunardi
title: Besouro
